message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is my bottom line. I'm confident you'll see a strong return on this investment.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $13,000. I'm not willing to pay more than that.
